name: Fresh install a Jira and add a V3 instance when there are no legacy instances and licensing is respected

inline.description:
1. Use /cloud to create a Mattermost sever with an E0 license
2. Login to the new MM server and install the Jira V3 plugin
inline.expectedResult: Pluign can be installed and enabled on E0

customFields.Important notes about this step: There are several other valid ways this could be setup on existing Mattermost servers

inline.description:
1. Type /Jira instance install <cloud or server> <Jira URL>
ex: /jira instance install cloud https://mmtest.atlassian.net
2. Type /jira instance connect <jira URL> to connect to the newly installed instance
inline.expectedResult: Instance is successfully installed and user can connect

inline.description: 1. Type /Jira instance install <cloud or server> <Jira URL>
inline.expectedResult: User is advised that additional instances cannot be installed without an E20 license
